t: Dallas Bonsai - Garden - Garland | D Magazine Directories
s: February 21, 2012 - Dallas Bonsai is a mail-order shop in a forlorn shopping center in Garland, but it is open to the public and has every kind of bonsai tool, pots, fertilizer and soil mix imaginable. Call ahead to make sure someone will be there (and will answer the door, it is mostly locked).
